column4: is there any known problem with Qt on hardy amd64? i'm experiencing crashes with the Psi instant messenger if i try to get into the appearance options. also all the Qt apps use an uglier font and theme than before on my last ubuntu install
it's the same font really just an option is turned off now I believe so the fonts do not look crisp
do you know how i can reverse that setting?
have to recompile a program I do believe
